Description: Nile silt pottery beaker, exterior coated with red slip with black top and well-burnished, flat base and slightly convex flaring sides everting at the lip. Interior lip slipped and burnished, rest of interior untreated.
Curator's comments: Black top red ware B21A or B26a in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921). Marked R128 on side.
